select d.number,d.state,f.name as 'first_location', s.name as 'second_location', d.detect_man, d.start_time from tb_Detect d, tb_FirstAddr f, tb_SecondAddr s where d.first_addr=f.first_no and d.second_addr=s.second_no and d.state=0
